General.Name: RheinLand Holding AG
General.Description: RheinLand Holding AG provides various insurance products and services for private and commercial customers in Germany and internationally. It sells its products through a network of agents, customer advisors, and sales managers. RheinLand Holding AG was founded in 1880 and is based in Neuss, Germany.
